<p id = "desc">In February 2018, I participated in BYU-Idaho's first ever team in the <a href="http://www.comap.com" target="_blank">COMAP Mathematical Modeling Competition</a>. For this competition, we were given the choice between 6 different prompts, and were given 4 days to create a mathematical model that would offer a solution to the prompts.</p>
